alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Jefferson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 10:34PM CDT until May 17 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN JEFFERSON AND DOUGLAS COUNTIES... At 1034 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Williamstown to 3 miles east of Globe, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lawrence, Baldwin City, Oskaloosa, Eudora, Perry, McLouth, Meriden, Lecompton, Clinton, Lone Star, Pleasant Grove, Vinland, Williamstown, Perry Lake, Grantville, Clinton Lake and Globe. This includes Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 189 and 205. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
